pages.text: 23|28|haey nowpel del anak ning anak ruom chomnue cheamuoy anak ban  laeng towleu saampow haey noh  chaur anak pol tha  real kar sarsaer  ku champoh a l laoh temuoyokt  del trong ban sangkroh puok yeung aoy  ruochphot pi krom del bampean .
23|29|haey chaur anak pol tha  ao mcheasa robsakhnhom.  saum trong me tda aoy  khnhom chohcht nowkanleng muoy da mean porchy phng choh .  haey trong chea anak  bratan kanleng da la brasaer bamphot .
23|30|pitabrakd nasa  nowknong rueng noh kuchea phosdo tang  ( banhcheak pi pheap khlangokla robsa a l laoh) .  haey yeung pitchea ban  sakalbong puokke .
23|31|kraoyomk  yeung ban bangkeut mnoussa chomnean phe  sa ng  tiet  banteabpi puokke .

23|32|haey yeung ban chattang aoy puokke nouv anakneasar mneak knong  chamnaom puokke ( daoy aoy ke ampeavneav tha)  chaur puok anak korp sakkar  champoh a l laoh choh  proh puok anak kmean mcheasa na phe  sa ng krawpi trong  laey .  tae puok anak min kaotakhlach a l laoh te ryy

23|33|haey puok medoeknoam nei krom robsa ke del kmean chomnue ning  ban bdeseth nung kar chuob nei thngai barlok  haeyning puok del yeung  ban phdal pheap sabbayrikreay knong chivit lokey ban niyeay tha  ke( hou t) nih minmen chea avei krawpi chea mnoussa thommotea dauch puok anak del  ke briphok nouv avei del puok anak briphok  ning phoek nouv avei del puok anakphoek  noh laey .
23|34|haey brasenbae puok anak brate b tde tam mnoussa thommotea dauch  puok anak der noh  dau che  neah puok anak pitchea khatabng cheaminkhan .
23|35|tae ke sanyea nung puok anak tha  pitabrakd nasa nowpel  del puok anak slab  haey ban klaycha thouli  ning chhaoeng  puok anak pitchea  nung trauv ke thveu aoy rsa laengvinh mdongtiet ryy
23|36|avei del puok anak trauv ke sanyea noh ku chhngay cheatibamphot .
23|37|kmean karorsanow na krawpi karorsanow robsa puok yeung knong  lokey laey  daoy puok yeung slab ning puok yeung rsa  haey puok  yeung ka min trauv ke thveu aoy rsa laengvinh der .
23|38|ke( hou t) minmen chea avei krawpi chea borsa del ban bradit  rueng phout kohk towleu a l laoh noh laey .  haey puok yeung ka  min mean chomnue nung ke der .
23|39|ke( hou t) ban buongsuong som tha  ao mcheasa robsakhnhom.  saum trong  me tda chuoy khnhom ampi avei del puokke ban bdeseth nung khnhom phng .
23|40|a l laoh ban mean bantoul tha  knongorypel b ndi ch tiet  puokke pitchea nung klaytowchea puok del mean vibbadesari cheaminkhan  .

23|41|haey samrek da khlang ban chhk yk chivit robsa puokke yeang  pitabrakd .  haey yeung ban thveu aoy puokke dauch saamream( del andet  leu tuk) .  dau che  neah  vineasa a nd reay haey champoh krom del bampean .
23|42|kraoyomk  yeung ban bangkeut mnoussa cheachraen chomnean phe  sang  tiet banteabpi puokke .
